sentences.en: A sesame stalk puts forth blossoms notch by notch, higher and higher.
A single pale blue flower grows up from each joint on a long stalk.
sentences.cn: 一条长长的茎秆的每个节上都会长出一朵浅蓝色的花。
一只悄悄跟踪猎物的老虎

sentences.en: Corn is treated when the stalk starts to elongate.
sentences.cn: 在玉米秆开始拔节时，给玉米打药。

sentences.en: Even after their divorce he continued to stalk and threaten her.
sentences.cn: 即使在离婚后他仍继续纠缠和威胁她。

sentences.en: Ghosts are said to stalk the castle walls.
sentences.cn: 据说有鬼魂在这座城堡的墙上出没.

sentences.en: He placed his pack on the ground and began to stalk the birds like a cat.
sentences.cn: 他在地上放下背包,开始象猫那样蹑手蹑足地来抓鸟.

sentences.en: He plucked a stalk of dried fennel.
I'm afraid famine will stalk over the land.
sentences.cn: 恐怕饥荒要在那个地方蔓延起来.

sentences.en: If his patience is tried at meetings he has been known to stalk out.
sentences.cn: 大家都知道如果他在会议上失去耐心，便会愤怒离席。

sentences.en: It was not a stalk; it was an ambush.
sentences.cn: 这不是暗暗跟踪 而是 伏袭.

sentences.en: It's no better than a hollow stalk.
sentences.cn: 那比根空麦秆子好不了多少.

sentences.en: Once again there'stalk of very dark days ahead.
sentences.cn: 又有传言说以后的日子会非常艰难。

sentences.en: Police officers lie in wait for the gangs who stalk their prey at night.
sentences.cn: 警察设伏等待那些在晚上跟踪目标伺机作案的歹徒。

sentences.en: The lion will often stalk its prey for hours.
sentences.cn: 狮子经常悄然跟踪猎物达几个小时。

sentences.en: They looked as much alike as two grains of wheat on the same stalk.
sentences.cn: 他们的长相一模一样,就象一根麦秆上的两颗麦粒.

sentences.en: We know the rapist stalks his victims at night.
sentences.cn: 我们知道那个强奸犯在夜间偷偷地跟踪受害人。

words.tran_cn: （植物的）茎，秆；（支持叶子、果实和花的）[植]梗，[生物]柄；追踪；高视阔步
高视阔步地走；潜近，偷偷接近

trans.tran_cn: [植]茎，秆，叶柄，花梗，高视阔步，偷偷接近，潜随
trans.tran_en: a long narrow part of a plant that supports leaves, fruits, or flowers
to follow a person or animal quietly in order to catch and attack or kill them

trans.tran_cn: 高视阔步地走，潜近，偷偷接近
trans.tran_en: to walk in a proud or angry way, with long steps
to follow a person or animal quietly in order to catch and attack or kill them
